effect: **On Enter:** You may put a **preparation** counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain **agility 3** for this turn. *(**Agility 3** — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)
flavor: “Consider it done. Just worry about my payment.”
name: Tristan, Underhanded
effect_html: On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don’t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)

effect:
**Tristan Lineage**

**On Enter:** If CARDNAME has two or more **preparation** counters on her, draw a card. Then if CARDNAME has four or more **preparation** counters on her, draw an additional card.
effect_raw:
Tristan Lineage

On Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.
name: Tristan, Hired Blade
effect_html: Tristan LineageOn Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.

effect:
**Tristan Lineage**

Tristan can level up into champions of the same base level. When she does, draw two cards.

**On Enter:** Banish the top four cards of target opponent’s deck face down. As long as they’re banished, you may play those cards, ignoring their elemental requirements.
effect_raw:
Tristan Lineage

Tristan can level up into champions of the same base level. When she does, draw two cards.

On Enter: Banish the top four cards of target opponent’s deck face down. As long as they’re banished, you may play those cards, ignoring their elemental requirements.
name: Tristan, Shadowreaver

rule.description: You are allowed to look at the facedown banished cards but your opponents are not.
Tristan, Shadowreaver leveling up into other champions of the same base level will act as if your champion has leveled up normally.

effect_html: Tristan LineageTristan can level up into champions of the same base level. When she does, draw two cards.On Enter: Banish the top four cards of target opponent’s deck face down. As long as they’re banished, you may play those cards, ignoring their elemental requirements.

effect:
[Polkhawk Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate.

Your champion’s first attack using a Gun weapon during your next turn gets +10 [POWER].

effect: [Class Bonus] **On Enter:** Reveal the top three cards from your deck. Banish one of those cards and put the rest into your graveyard. If the banished card is a Spell card, you may activate it as long as you control CARDNAME.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: Reveal the top three cards from your deck. Banish one of those cards and put the rest into your graveyard. If the banished card is a Spell card, you may activate it as long as you control Naia.
name: Naia, Diviner of Fortunes

rule.description: If you lose class bonus after resolving the effect, you may still activate the banished spell.

effect_html: Class Bonus On Enter: Reveal the top three cards from your deck. Banish one of those cards and put the rest into your graveyard. If the banished card is a Spell card, you may activate it as long as you control Naia.

effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two cards with **floating memory** from your graveyard.

[Nico Bonus] **On Champion Hit:** For each damage counter on the hit champion, their controller puts the top two cards from their deck into their graveyard.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two cards with floating memory from your graveyard.

[Nico Bonus] On Champion Hit: For each damage counter on the hit champion, their controller puts the top two cards from their deck into their graveyard.
name: Ravishing Finale
effect_html: As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two cards with floating memory from your graveyard.Nico Bonus On Champion Hit: For each damage counter on the hit champion, their controller puts the top two cards from their deck into their graveyard.

effect:
**Imbue 3**

As long as CARDNAME is **imbued**, CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER] and +1 [LIFE], and has **vigor**.

[Class Bonus] **On Enter:** Put a **buff** counter on up to two Automaton allies you control.
effect_raw:
Imbue 3

As long as Andronika is imbued, Andronika gets +1 POWER and +1 LIFE, and has vigor.

[Class Bonus] On Enter: Put a buff counter on up to two Automaton allies you control.
name: Andronika, Eternal Herald

rule.description: You reserve the cards face up. You do not place them face down and then 'reveal' them.

effect_html: Imbue 3As long as Andronika is imbued, Andronika gets +1 and +1, and has vigor.Class Bonus On Enter: Put a buff counter on up to two Automaton allies you control.

effect:
[Vanitas Bonus] [Level 2+] This card costs 2 less to activate.

The next time your champion would take 4 or less combat damage this turn, prevent it. Your champion’s first attack without a weapon during your next turn gets +**X** [POWER], where **X** is the amount of damage prevented this way.
effect_raw:
[Vanitas Bonus] [Level 2+] This card costs 2 less to activate.

The next time your champion would take 4 or less combat damage this turn, prevent it. Your champion’s first attack without a weapon during your next turn gets +X POWER, where X is the amount of damage prevented this way.
name: Vainglory Retribution
effect_html: Vanitas Bonus Level 2+ This card costs 2 less to activate.The next time your champion would take 4 or less combat damage this turn, prevent it. Your champion’s first attack without a weapon during your next turn gets +X, where X is the amount of damage prevented this way.

effect:
[Arisanna Bonus] **Brew** — Four Herbs with different names

[REST]**:** Draw a card into your memory. If CARDNAME was **brewed**, the next time an astra element source you control would deal damage to one or more units this turn, it deals that much damage plus 3 to those units instead.
effect_raw:
[Arisanna Bonus] Brew — Four Herbs with different names

REST: Draw a card into your memory. If Prima Materia was brewed, the next time an astra element source you control would deal damage to one or more units this turn, it deals that much damage plus 3 to those units instead.
name: Prima Materia

rule.description: An astra element source includes any object or card that is astra element.

effect_html: Arisanna Bonus Brew — Four Herbs with different names: Draw a card into your memory. If Prima Materia was brewed, the next time an astra element source you control would deal damage to one or more units this turn, it deals that much damage plus 3 to those units instead.

effect:
**On Enter:** **Summon** two Atmos Shield tokens.

[Class Bonus] CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER] for each ally named Atmos Shield you control.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Summon two Atmos Shield tokens.

[Class Bonus] Atmos Armor Type-Ares gets +1 POWER for each ally named Atmos Shield you control.
flavor: A gilded masterpiece to execute and enforce the golden commands of the Aurous Kaiser herself.
name: Atmos Armor Type-Ares
effect_html: On Enter: Summon two Atmos Shield tokens.Class Bonus Atmos Armor Type-Ares gets +1 for each ally named Atmos Shield you control.

effect:
**On Enter:** **Summon** two Automaton Drone tokens. 

[Class Bonus] Token objects you control have **reservable**. *(While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest objects with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.)*

[Class Bonus] Token objects you control have reservable. (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest objects with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: “History favors the victor, and I intend to write it.”
name: Cordelia, Aurous Kaiser
effect_html: On Enter: Summon two Automaton Drone tokens. Class Bonus Token objects you control have reservable. (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest objects with reservable to pay for 1 of that cost.)

effect:
[Diana Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate.

If your champion has twenty or more damage counters on them, **recover 4**.

For the rest of the game, Curse cards in lineages have “**Inherited Effect:** At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 unpreventable damage to this object.”
effect_raw:
[Diana Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate.

If your champion has twenty or more damage counters on them, recover 4.

For the rest of the game, Curse cards in lineages have “Inherited Effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 unpreventable damage to this object.”
name: Curse Amplification
effect_html: Diana Bonus This card costs 3 less to activate.If your champion has twenty or more damage counters on them, recover 4.For the rest of the game, Curse cards in lineages have “Inherited Effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 unpreventable damage to this object.”

effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, remove **X** **preparation** counters from your champion. 

Prevent the next **X+3** damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn. 

[Tristan Bonus] If **X** is 3 or greater, **summon** two Ominous Shadow tokens.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, remove X preparation counters from your champion. 

Prevent the next X+3 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn. 

[Tristan Bonus] If X is 3 or greater, summon two Ominous Shadow tokens.
name: Penumbral Waltz
effect_html: As an additional cost to activate this card, remove X preparation counters from your champion. Prevent the next X+3 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn. Tristan Bonus If X is 3 or greater, summon two Ominous Shadow tokens.
